#include<bits/stdc++.h>
#define gc getchar
typedef long long int ll;
using namespace std;
ll read_int() {
char c = gc();
while(c<'0' || c>'9') c = gc();
ll ret = 0;
while(c>='0' && c<='9') {
ret = 10 * ret + c - 48;
c = gc();
}
return ret;
}
bool isSubsetSum(ll a[], ll n, ll sum)
{
   if (sum == 0)
     return true;
   if (n == 0 && sum != 0)
     return false;
   if (a[n-1] > sum)
     return isSubsetSum(a, n-1, sum);
   return isSubsetSum(a, n-1, sum) || isSubsetSum(a, n-1, sum-a[n-1]);
}
int main()
{
    ll t,n,k,i;
    cin>>t;
    while(t--)
    {
        cin>>n>>k;
        ll a[n+1];
        for(i=0;i<n;i++)
        {
            cin>>a[i];
        }
        bool r=isSubsetSum(a,n,k);
        if(r==true)
            cout<<"YES\n";
        else
            cout<<"NO\n";
    }
    return 0;
}
